long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To easily be able to paste OCaml or ReasonML syntax and get the equivalent in the targeted language-syntax.

Use the button down to the right to select the target syntax e.g. ReasonML, then paste the OCaml-code into the textarea.
